design_system.philosophy: Swiss Utility & High Contrast. Function over decoration. Clarity is the ultimate sophistication.

semantic.room_selected: bg-zinc-900 text-white border-zinc-900 shadow-lg scale-105 z-10

layout_strategy.grid_system: Custom CSS Grid for Rooms. 10 Rows (Floors).
layout_strategy.alignment: Left-aligned text. Optical alignment for icons.
layout_strategy.responsive: Mobile: Stacked. Desktop: Split view (Controls Top/Side, Grid Main).

RoomCell.description: Individual room unit. Must look like a physical keycard or door plate.
RoomCell.styles: h-12 w-full flex items-center justify-center text-sm font-mono transition-all duration-200 border select-none
RoomCell.interaction: Click to toggle selection (if available). Hover effect: lift and border darken.

FloorRow.description: Horizontal container for a single floor.

StaircaseColumn.description: Vertical visual anchor on the left representing the building core.
StaircaseColumn.styles: w-16 flex flex-col items-center justify-between py-4 bg-zinc-50 border-r border-zinc-200 h-full font-mono text-xs text-zinc-400 writing-vertical-lr

ControlPanel.description: Floating or sticky header for actions.
ControlPanel.styles: sticky top-0 z-50 w-full bg-white/80 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-zinc-200 p-4 flex items-center justify-between gap-4

images.description: Subtle concrete texture for the app background or sidebar to give a physical feel.

assets.icons: Lucide React (ArrowUp, ArrowDown, Box, History, RotateCcw, Shuffle)

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Install 'lucide-react' and 'clsx' 'tailwind-merge' if not present.
2. FONTS: Add 'Chivo' and 'Public Sans' via Google Fonts in index.html or CSS.
3. LAYOUT: Implement the 'Staircase Left, Rooms Right' layout strictly. The Staircase should be a visual column.
4. ALGORITHM: The 'Book' button must trigger the travel time optimization logic (mocked or real).
5. VISUALS: Use the 'RoomCell' style defined above. Do not make them simple colored squares. Give them borders and subtle interaction states.
6. DATA-TESTID: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (e.g., 'room-101', 'book-btn', 'reset-btn').
7. THEME: Force Light Mode. Do not implement Dark Mode unless requested later. The aesthetic is 'Swiss Medical/Hotel'.
8. HISTORY: Use a Sheet (Side Drawer) or a ScrollArea in the sidebar for Booking History.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI slop' - generic centered layouts and gradients.
